description: As a core developer of SARA Hotel Service Management, I create high-level system designs, lead project planning and resource allocation, coach team members, conduct code reviews, and optimize development processes using TypeScript, React.js, and Next.js.
I develop for SARA with React.js and PHP CodeIgniter3, crafted bespoke JavaScript components for Breguet, and enhanced the Urban Fitouts website using HTML, CSS, JavaScript, and Drupal CMS.

Take a role as a programmer focusing on the frontend using Vue JS, Vuetify, Vuex, and Vue-Router. I work on my last project on developing IS to manage the laboratory of Teaching Industry Biomaterial Universitas Indonesia.

I lead a consulting team consisting of a system analyst, two designers, and four programmers. Our client is one of the laboratories in the Faculty of Engineering UI, namely Teaching Industry Biomaterial UI. We are working on developing an information system to manage the laboratory's operations.
Develop EPMPro mobile app product of The eCEOs Sdn Bhd. (As Frontend Mobile Developer & UI/UX Designer)
